Comments_List: Not only did I get better at Indonesian, but I got the chance to learn a lot about their culture.
I learned about how to speak the Indonesian language along with learning about Indonesian culture.
I learned more about the Indonesian language and culture.
I learned how to speak Indonesian and very much about its culture and traditions.
Sometimes its not clear what is going on, communication is not super clear.
While the classes can on occasion be disorganized, they are incredibly fun due to the constant positive energy that the teacher brings to the class everyday.
I think this is an awesome class as the professor and teaching assistants are awesome. Class is fun and we do really cool activities beyond just typical notes and homework.
The process used to teach the language is very efficient.  To improve, they could be more clear about assignments, but that's being nitpicky.
If they had to fulfill a language requirement or were extremely motivated
Yes the teachers are amazing as well as the class atmosphere.
I would definitely recommend this class as it is a unique opportunity to be exposed to the culture and language of another part of the world.
Absolutely, it is a very fun and interesting class, great professor and environment to learn.
